query: query Ship($id: ID, $unit: LengthUnit) { ship(id: $id) { id name length(unit: $unit) } }
query Ships($unit: LengthUnit) { ships { id name length(unit: $unit) } }
query Fleet($id: ID, $unit: LengthUnit) { fleet(id: $id) { id name units { id name length(unit: $unit) } } }
query Fleets($unit: LengthUnit) { fleets { id name units { id name length(unit: $unit) } } }
